body_html: Thanks for following up - as a workaround I'm currently doing pkill -f "bazel\(tensorflow\)" after each build. Also I'm deleting /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/ after the build since on most Linux systems the root partition is quite small and these gigabyte+ caches are going to fill up /root rather quickly.

body: Thanks for following up - as a workaround I'm currently doing `pkill -f "bazel\(tensorflow\)"` after each build. Also I'm deleting /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/ after the build since on most Linux systems the root partition is quite small and these gigabyte+ caches are going to fill up /root rather quickly.
